class_libraries.library:
<class name="constraint_aware_spline_smoother/CubicSplineShortCutterFilterJointTrajectoryWithConstraints" type="constraint_aware_spline_smoother::CubicSplineShortCutter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Generates collision free cubic spline trajectories
<class name="constraint_aware_spline_smoother/ParabolicBlendShortCutterFilterJointTrajectoryWithConstraints" type="constraint_aware_spline_smoother::ParabolicBlendShortCutter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Generates collision free parabolic spline trajectories
<class name="constraint_aware_spline_smoother/LinearSplineShortCutterFilterJointTrajectoryWithConstraints" type="constraint_aware_spline_smoother::LinearSplineShortCutter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Generates collision free linear trajectories
<class name="constraint_aware_spline_smoother/IterativeParabolicSmootherFilterJointTrajectoryWithConstraints" type="constraint_aware_spline_smoother::IterativeParabolicSmoother" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Generates parabolic trajectories. No collision checking.
